channel.title: Interested in Coding and making new servers. I'm new!
channel.description: Hello all, i am interested in creating my very own server. I need a blank client-- any ideas on which one? How do i start from scratch and make shops, items, npcs, etc. I have just started, and im interested in coding and making a server, yet i have no clue how. Can someone post beginner links on how to do everything? Thank you soo much!

item.title: Interested in Coding and making new servers. I'm new!
item.dc:creator: @DeltaLegitz DeltaLegitz
item.description:
@DeltaLegitz wrote:

  1. Wrong Section
  2. Use the Search Button.
  3. If your new doesn’t mean you come along and ask obvious stuff… on your way down here you saw the “Dwonloads” sections, Go download one.
  4. There are heaps of guides so don’t say you didn’t know.
  5. No-one here is going to spoon-feed you…

Read full topic
item.source: Interested in Coding and making new servers. I'm new!
